attributes.additional_details: This man as has been a a true hero in this pandemic. Rising money for the NHS. And serving his country. His is a true Inspiration to us all.
attributes.background: His a beautiful soul shame they can't do a sculpture of him and put it near the  veterans war memorial and under veil it for his 100 birthday

rejection.details: This isn't something that the UK Government or Parliament are responsible for. The erection of a statue would a matter for the local authority wherever the statue was to be located.
